name: Sphere Colliders
description:
This game is part of a study with particle system, simple animations and physics in Unity 3D.

The Project is an extension of the Junior Progammer's  prototype 4 with the bonus features and some other gimmicks.

I hope this help other young designers to expand their creativity and play around with their own ideas.

Made by Gustavo Mondini

Twitter: @Gmondini7
